appDesc.message: Stay focused in a world full of distractions.

whitelistDescription.message: You can only visit the following websites:

blacklistDescription.message: You cannot visit the following websites:

websiteUrlPlaceholder.message: Please enter the URL of the website here

privateModeWarning.message: For some browser compatibility reasons, the panel may not work on private mode. Please use the settings page to whitelist or blacklist websites.

panelNotAccessible.message: Panel is not accessible at the current time.

actionToTake.message: Choose an action to take for these websites:

actionToTakeForTheRest.message: Choose an action to take for the rest of websites:

disableKeyboardWhenErrorMessageIsDisplay.message: Disable keyboard when error message is displayed
